channel.title: Posts on Jin Shenghao's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jin Shenghao's Website

item.title: 旧照换新颜——对一张童年照片的处理
item.description: 照片信息 这张照片摄于2011年的大连市滨海公路附近。拍摄时间是UTC+8 5月1日14:15。 关于这张照片的幻灯片🐶 在线预览 由于预览很模糊且丧失了音效、字体，建议下载后观看

item.title: Hello World🎉
item.description: My first blog. This is the first blog I published on my personal site. I mainly share my thoughts on blogs and exchange technology. From now on, I will record my thoughts and bring help and good feelings to everyone. How is this site made? My personal site was created by Github’s personal static page hosting service and Hugo, a static page building tool. For more information, please search the following keywords on google: GitHub pages Hugo My Heart Will Go On, by Celine Dion (Test Text) Every night in my dreams
